mapper.select: select p.*, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_offers go where go.performance_id=p.id) as offer_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_views gv where gv.performance_id=p.id) as view_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_follows gf where gf.goods_id=p.id) as follow_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods g where g.performance_id=p.id) as goods_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_deposits gd where gd.performance_id=p.id) as deposit_count from paimai_performances p where id = #{id}

select p.*, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_offers go where go.goods_id=p.id) as offer_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_views gv where gv.goods_id=p.id) as view_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_follows gf where gf.goods_id=p.id) as follow_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods g where g.performance_id=p.id) as goods_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_deposits gd where gd.performance_id=p.id) as deposit_count from paimai_performances p ${ew.customSqlSegment}
